TerrorRadius.Description: Terror radius of The Shape at Evil Within I (in centimetres)

TerrorRadius_Tier1.Description: Terror radius of The Shape at Evil Within II (in centimetres)

TerrorRadius_Tier2.Description: Terror radius of The Shape at Evil Within III (in centimetres)

SlasherAttackPounceOpenTimeStalkTier0.Description: Duration of lunge in EW I

SlasherAttackPounceOpenTimeStalkTier1.Description: Duration of lunge in EW II

SlasherAttackPounceOpenTimeStalkTier2.Description: Duration of lunge in EW III

SlasherStalkerTierSpeedMultiplier0.Description: % of normal move speed while in EW I

SlasherStalkerTierSpeedMultiplier1.Description: % of normal move speed while in EW II

SlasherStalkerTierSpeedMultiplier2.Description: % of normal move speed while in EW III

KillerSight_ScreenVisibilityZoneRadiusPe.Description: Horizontal ratio of the screen to be designated as the visibility zone (outwards from center)
Vertical ratio of the screen to be designated as the visibility zone (outwards from center)

KillerSight_MinimumCharacterScreenPercen.Description: Minimum percent of the screen occupied by the character to begin being considered seen while their centerpoint is in sight zone
Minimum percent of the screen that needs to be occupied by the character to begin being seen if they are outside of the Visibility Zone

KillerSight_MinimumCharacterVisiblePixel.Description: Minimum percent of the pixels on the character's body that needs to be visible to begin being considered as seen

KillerSight_MinimumCharacterScreenPercen.Description: Minimum percent of the screen occupied by the character to continue to be considered seen while their centerpoint is in sight zone
Minimum percent of the screen that needs to be occupied by the character to continue to be seen if they are outside of the Visibility Zone

KillerSight_MinimumCharacterVisiblePixel.Description: Minimum percent of the pixels on the character's body that needs to be visible to continue to be considered as seen
